```{rinit}
library(FLCore)
library(ggplotFL)
library(reshape)
library(plyr)
library(kobe)
library(FLBRP)
library(lh)
library(biodyn)
library(popbio)

theme_set(theme_bw(base_size=10))

dirDat="/home/laurie/MEGAsync/mse/albn/data"

load(paste(dirDat,"/om.RData",    sep=""))
load(paste(dirDat,"/bd.RData",    sep=""))
load(paste(dirDat,"/eql.RData",   sep=""))
load(paste(dirDat,"/priors.RData",sep=""))

yrs  =range(om[[1]])["maxyear"]+0:30
range=c(range(om[[1]])["maxyear"],range(om[[1]])["maxyear"]+30,3)
names(range)=c("min","max","interval")  

uDev =rlnorm(100,FLQuant(0,dimnames=list(year=yrs)),.2)
srDev=rlnorm(100,FLQuant(0,dimnames=list(year=yrs)),.3)
```
